QuestData.Title: A Father's Words
QuestData.Description: There is someone who might shed light on this mystery, $r. It is rumored that the Kvaldir have kept a naga priestess alive at the temple on the west side of the shore.$B$BShe will no doubt have great reason to resent her uninvited Kvaldir guests. Perhaps my father is expecting her to cooperate with you in some way.
QuestData.LogDescription: Look for Veehja at the Shrine of Scales on Riplash Strand.
QuestData.RewardText: Hsssssssssssss! Have you come to mock me, $r?
